title: Why you shouldn’t listen to the experts
author: VD
content_html:
Sports Illustrated’s Peter King’s predictions for NFL 2004


MVP: Jake Plummer.

Coach of the Year: Mike Holmgren.

Rookies of the Year: Kevin Jones (Offense, Detroit), Darnell Dockett (Defense, Arizona.).

Super Bowl XXXIX: Broncos 30, Seahawks 13.

Or not so much….
content_text:
Sports Illustrated’s Peter King’s predictions for NFL 2004
MVP: Jake Plummer.
Coach of the Year: Mike Holmgren.
Rookies of the Year: Kevin Jones (Offense, Detroit), Darnell Dockett (Defense, Arizona.).
Super Bowl XXXIX: Broncos 30, Seahawks 13.
Or not so much….
